Enter as customer Admin interface

If the above links do not work, the Interchange server may not be running. Try one of these to restart it:
    /etc/rc.d/init.d/interchange restart
    /usr/local/interchange/bin/restart
This is the "foundation" demonstration of the Interchange electronic catalog system. Links that will help you to use this software:

    1. Frequently Asked Questions
    2. Interchange Documentation
    3. User support mail lists
